CustomField.description: NICC-046276 The Annual Revenue Increase Confidence % * Estimated Annual Revenue Increase. If this project is related to a product line/solution domain, then the calculation factors in the gross margin % for that product line. This field is automatically calculated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Annual Revenue Increase Confidence % * Estimated Annual Revenue Increase. If this project is related to a product line/solution domain, then the calculation factors in the gross margin % for that product line. This field is automatically calculated.
CustomField.label: First Year Annual Revenue Increase
